function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Utilization of human detector model for monitoring public spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate long-term monitoring of crowd behavior and contamination trends","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of social distancing violations leading to high-risk categories of individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection and tracking of individual movement data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of high-risk zones and creation of risk heat-map","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of environmental noise for visualization of heat-map","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Identifying couples based on proximity and time could lead to inaccurate assumptions about their actual relationship, potentially missing true social contacts or interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enforcement of proximity-based social distancing measures may result in privacy concerns and resistance from individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for identifying social distancing violations may lead to errors in detection and interpretation of human behaviors.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on social distancing guidelines for family members and couples","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of inter-people distance due to controversial opinions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrecognized social distancing violations in risky zones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of people with partial visibility or truncated objects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social distancing violation due to inaccurate distance measurements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of social distancing monitoring models with low speed","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Frequent cases of occlusions, overlaps, and crowded zones in the dataset","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal condition for speed and generalisability testing on the otc dataset","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Benchmarking tests and comparisons conducted on a single hardware and software platform","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Training on a large number of samples from the google open images dataset, including human body parts, increases the risk of model overfitting to specific characteristics of that dataset and may not generalize well to other datasets.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Utilizing a transfer learning approach with pre-trained models may introduce biases and assumptions from the source dataset microsoft coco into the human detection model, leading to biased predictions and potential fairness issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using stochastic gradient descent sgd with warm restarts and a cosine annealing learning rate schedule may lead to challenges in hyperparameter tuning and model convergence, as well as the need for careful adjustment of learning rate values.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close human interaction and contact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate training data for human detection model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the geometric transformation and mapping in the context of computer vision","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using euclidean distance in 2d space for inter-people distance estimation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of camera calibration and intrinsic parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Error in camera height, angle of view, and optics specifications","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through close contact with detected humans in public places","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mosaic data augmentation, class label smoothing, and dropblock regularisation in the input part of the detection module","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of the simple online and real-time sort tracking technique for people tracking and id assignment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on the hungarian optimization technique for assigning unique id numbers to individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of complex mathematical equations may lead to errors in implementation or understanding","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overfitting may occur due to the use of specific techniques such as dropblock and class label smoothing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of the loss function and its parameters may lead to suboptimal training outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through contact with the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multi-scale detection techniques may increase computational resource requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient spatial pooling operations may impact the accuracy and efficiency of the model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of selective search and region proposal for two-stage detectors may introduce potential biases in object detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential difficulty in dealing with low-resolution images","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in detecting small objects in images","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of local information during feature extraction process","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of dense models and multiple layers may increase the complexity of the model, making it harder to train","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of extra layers between the backbone and the head neck module may introduce additional complexity and potential points of failure in the model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of a backbone architecture with a higher number of parameters may lead to increased complexity and resource requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of data augmentation techniques such as mosaic may create a false sense of data variety and lead to overfitting if not used carefully","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Noisy estimation of mean and variance in batch normalization due to batch size reduction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection and evaluation of activation functions may result in suboptimal model performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of the system on all types of cctv surveillance cameras","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on large training datasets for people detection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inherent limitations of object detection models and algorithms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
